message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.SD 

This paper deals with text classification using social media datasets, specifically Twitter tweets. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also involves feature selection and extraction, which falls under the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Additionally, the paper uses different learners to solve a multi-class classification task, which is related to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with clustering, which falls under the sub-category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). Finally, the paper deals with spam detection, which is related to the sub-category of cs.SD (Sound and Music Computing).
